name: Pieter W. M. Koopman
content: Pieter's Home Page Pieter Koopman Currently I am Universitair Docent (assistant Professor) at the Model based System Depatment department of the Institute for Computing and Information Sciences, in the Faculty of Science of the Radboud University Nijmegen, the Netherlands. How to reach me E-mail pieter@cs.ru.nl Phone +31 24 3652483 Fax +31 24 3652525 Visiting address Room M1.01.7 Heyendaalseweg 135 6525 AJ Nijmegen Model Based Systems Department Faculty of Science Institute for Computing and Information Sciences Radboud University Nijmegen The Netherlands Surface mail Dr. Pieter Koopman Faculty of Science Postvak 47 Postbus 9010 6500 GL, Nijmegen The Netherlands Research My research is related to functional programming, especially the functional programming language Clean , and embedded domain specific languages. Currently I use functions in Clean as specifications for the automatic test system Gast. Here are some links to subpages about projects I worked on: iTasks Gast: a Generic Automatic Software Test-system Teaching Here is some information about the courses I teach. All courses are part of the education of Education Institute for Computing and Information Sciences. ·       Object Orientation, 1st year Bachelor Computer Science (together with Sjaak Smetsers) For this course we use special software: Visual Paradigm Academic Partner Program provides Radboud University Nijmegen with the use of VP for educational purpose. The New Devices lab 2nd year Bachelor Computer Science (together with Rinus Plasmeijer). Advanced Programming, Master Computer Science (together with Rinus Plasmeijer). Compiler Construction, Master Computer Science (together with Rinus Plasmeijer and Peter Achten). Other interests Archery, hiking. playing Baritone Sax (in Dutch).
